body: What is the difference between TDM and Nexus? I know how there is the kits in Nexus and not in TDM, but are there really any other differences?
body_tagged: What is the difference between TDM and Nexus? I know how there is the kits in Nexus and not in TDM, but are there really any other differences?
title: The Difference between TDM and Nexus

replies.body: You can mine/place blocks in TDM. You can have one hit weapons in TDM.
replies.body_tagged: You can mine/place blocks in TDM. You can have one hit weapons in TDM.

replies.body: TDM in Nebula is for the most part one shot kills. Nexus TDM is kit pvp.
replies.body_tagged: TDM in Nebula is for the most part one shot kills. Nexus TDM is kit pvp.
